subject: Football
College Athletics
Bowl Games
lead_paragraph: The Meineke Bowl in Charlotte, N.C., has renewed its agreement with the Big East, which will send the conference’s third selection to the game through the 2013 season.
snippet: The Meineke Bowl in Charlotte, N.C., has renewed its agreement with the Big East, which will send the conference’s third selection to the game through the 2013 season.
